main

Class Turtle

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.GameObject
      • main.Turtle

  • public class Turtle
extends GameObject
    A GameObject which represents a turtle, which will move around using commands stored in a Command object and change location accordingly.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int stepsToTake 
      private Command turtleCommands 

      • Fields inherited from class main.GameObject

        currentLocation, objectColor

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Turtle(Command commands, Location startLocation, java.lang.String color)
      Create a new turtle object.
      Turtle(Command commands, java.lang.String color)
      Create a new turtle object at default location (0,0)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Command getTurtleCommands()
      Get the Command object associated with the turtle
      void setTurtleCommands(Command c)
      Set the commands for a Turtle
      boolean update()
      Update the turtle's location by either taking a step within the current MOVE command, or by going to the next command and updating the orientation/steps left to take.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Turtle

        public Turtle(Command commands,
              java.lang.String color)
        Create a new turtle object at default location (0,0)
        Parameters:
        commands - Command object to control the turtle
        color - The color of the turtle as a hex string (e.g. 0xFFFFFF)

      • Turtle

        public Turtle(Command commands,
              Location startLocation,
              java.lang.String color)
        Create a new turtle object.
        Parameters:
        commands - Command object to control turtle's movement
        startLocation - A Location object containing the starting location of the turtle
        color - The color of the turtle as a hex string (e.g. 0xFFFFFF)

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public boolean update()
        Update the turtle's location by either taking a step within the current MOVE command, or by going to the next command and updating the orientation/steps left to take.
        Returns:
        true if the turtle moved in space, or false if the turtle didn't move (e.g. turned)

      • getTurtleCommands

        public Command getTurtleCommands()
        Get the Command object associated with the turtle
        Returns:
        Command object containing commands controlling that turtle

      • setTurtleCommands

        public void setTurtleCommands(Command c)
        Set the commands for a Turtle
        Parameters:
        c - A Command object which will be used to control the turtle.
